title: 2 bedroom townhome, top floor, with city views & great light!
posting_body: ['Beautiful Cahill Park Neighborhood!', 'CALL:', 'show contact info', '$4,460', '.', '2 Bed 2.5 Bath .', '1,585 sq ft', 'Avalon at Cahill Park : 754 The Alameda San Jose, CA 95126', 'Property Website:', '<URL>', 'View video tour at <URL> or <URL>', 'DESCRIPTION', 'A perfect combination of amenities, service, and location!', 'Steps from downtown San Jose with everything you need including Whole Foods, entertainment/nightlife, restaurants, Caltrain, and VTA light rail stops just across the street!', 'We also offer you peace of mind through Avalon Assurance, our 30 day move-in satisfaction guarantee.', 'From the moment you move in, we are here for you.', 'Avalon at Cahill Park offers spaciously designed homes that boast high ceilings, gourmet kitchens, central air conditioning and heating, walk-in closets, private patios and other quality details found throughout every floor plan.', 'We also offer luxurious features and amenities to make you as comfortable as possible, such as a sparkling swimming pool, spa, state of the art fitness center, and an entertaining recreation room and clubhouse.', "Don't wait any longer to move into your dream home today!", 'FLOORPLAN/UNIT  FEATURES', 'Enormous top floor two story townhome with great light, city views, and oversized kitchen with island!', 'In-Unit Laundry Room With Washer/Dryer', 'Cable/Satellite/Hi-Speed Fiber Internet Available', 'Central Air Conditioning/Heating', 'Large Walk-In Closets', 'Double-Paned Windows', 'Disability Access', 'Refrigerator/Freezer With Ice Maker', 'Stove and Microwave', 'Dishwasher', 'Garbage Disposal', 'LEASE  TERMS', 'Flexible lease terms', 'OFFICE  HOURS', 'Tuesday:', '9:30am to 6:30pm', 'Wednesday:', '9:30am to 6:30pm', 'Thursday:', 'Closed', 'Friday:', '8:30am to 5:30pm', 'Saturday:', '8:30am to 5:30pm', 'Sunday:', '11:00am to 5:00pm', 'Monday:', 'Closed', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
